Monitor audio levels. If the bars are mo: Monitorizar níveis de áudio. Se as barras se movimentarem, significa que está a enviar áudio.
Time it takes between sound occuring and: Time it takes between sound occuring and being broadcast (ms)

Designates if this source is audible in: Designates if this source is audible in your live broadcast
Designates if this source is audible in your recorded track(s)
